description:
I thought Lucien was taking me to do some research for "Miracle Finder," but the road we travel stretches on and on through peaceful countryside. Refusing to tell me what we`re researching, Lucien proposes a picnic for a change of pace. Meanwhile, after hearing from Shaw, someone allied with Black Swan, that there are rumors of a darker side to the Task Force, Gavin starts investigating things on his own.
Source: crunchyroll
